amendment.description: To provide transparency and accountability with respect to the Coalition Provisional Authority.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1847 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1847 proposed by Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S12589; text: CR S12589) To provide transparency and accountability with respect to the Coalition Provisional Authority.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1847 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1847 proposed by Senator Feingold.
